revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT300N |revision=v2 |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |availability= |fcc_id=K7SF5D8231-4 |pcb_id=YBK10A-1.6MM |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP420;PRIXP420BB; |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320CBTC-70G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=PSC |ram1_model=A2V64S40CTP-G6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, JP1 |jtag= |wi1_module=Gemtek WMIA-194GN |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5416 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2133 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201CP |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:14:A5 |oui_eth=00:18:39 }} The [[Intel XScale]] processor is part PRIXP420BB. :WLAN chip2 is assumed to be AR2133 giving this device 3x3 capability. The device was apparently not distributed in the States. :It appears common in Europe. *[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linksys_routers Listed on the ''Linksys routers'' page on Wikipedia] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/openwrtdocs/hardware/linksys/wrt300n On the OpenWrt wiki] (high-res internal pictures) *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=5440 On the OpenWrt forums] (MAC mentions, 00:18:39 OUI) {{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_WRT300N_v2.0}} *[https://wiki.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_WRT300N_v2.0 ''Linksys WRT300N v2.0'' on the DD-WRT wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=39856 ''WRT300N V2 JTAG'' on the DD-WRT forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=28858 ''WRT300N V2.0'' on the DD-WRT forums] (DE) *[https://air-stream.org/wrt300n_hands_on/ ''Linksys WRT300N v2.0'' Review on the '''Air-Stream'''] ==Images== ----
